name: Copypaste Man
description:
This is my first 3D Unity Proyect.

It was realized for the C# Programming Course of SODVI UNAM

Instructions:

Move with arrow keys

Press 'P' to Open pause menu.

Press 'Spacebar' to jump.

Do NOT TOUCH the enemy's or you will die!!

Do NOT FALL or you will die!!

HAVE FUN!
